title: Mobile Animation Game-Based Mathematics Learning Program

context.additional_context: Enhanced field observation and reflective learning through personal smartphones, with project-based assessment to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can solve basic math problems (fraction/decimal operations) with over 80% accuracy in a mobile game environment
Learners complete and submit field observation journals over 90% through animation game-based activities
Learners write mathematical problem-solving reports reflecting game-based learning experiences in project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
